31 namespace rev {

34 class FontIcon;
35 class FontIconEngine;
36 #define FIcon(code) FontIcon::icon(code)
37 #define SAIcon(stuff) FontIcon::solidAwesomeIcon(stuff)
38 
42 // See: https://github.com/dridk/FontIcon/blob/master/FontIcon/qfonticon.cpp
43 class FontIconEngine : public QIconEngine {
44 public:
45  FontIconEngine();
46  ~FontIconEngine();
47  virtual void paint(QPainter * painter, const QRect& rect, QIcon::Mode mode, QIcon::State state)Q_DECL_OVERRIDE;
48  virtual QPixmap pixmap(const QSize &size, QIcon::Mode mode, QIcon::State state)Q_DECL_OVERRIDE;
49  void setFontFamily(const QString& family) { m_fontFamily = family; }
50  // define icon code using QChar or implicit using ushort ...
51  void setLetter(const QChar& letter) { m_letter = letter; }
52  // You can set a base color. I don't advice. Keep system color
53  void setBaseColor(const QColor& baseColor) { m_baseColor = baseColor; }
54  virtual QIconEngine* clone() const;
55 
56 private:
57  QString m_fontFamily;
58  QChar m_letter;
59  QColor m_baseColor;
60 };
61 
64 class FontIcon : public QObject {
65  Q_OBJECT
66 
67 public:
69  static int addFont(const QString& filename);
70  static FontIcon * instance();
71 
73  static QIcon icon(const QChar& code, const QColor& baseColor = QColor(), const QString& family = QString());
74  static QIcon solidAwesomeIcon(const QString& iconName, const QColor& baseColor = QColor());
75 
77  const QStringList& families() const;
78 
79 protected:
80  void addFamily(const QString& family);
81 
82 
83 private:
84  explicit FontIcon(QObject *parent = 0);
85  ~FontIcon();
86  static FontIcon * m_instance;
87  QStringList m_families;
88 
89 };
